Articles.Content:
I managed to land on the Mun a while ago on my second exploration mode save, why am I telling you about it on my second save instead of my first? Well, I deleted the first one because I realized that I didn't research the fuel lines node. During the mun landing, I decided to pay tribute to Neil Armstrong and the Apollo 11 mission, only with a "kerbalized" touch. Unfortunately I don't have a photo of it because I made this post on my Chromebook I use for school.  But once I conquer Kerbin's moon monuments, our next stop is Duna.

May the Kerbal gods be with you.

-Cameron Isaac Leroux

Edited March 27 by CameronLeroux
Do it again and take pics this time.
